alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Paulding, Haralson and northern Carroll Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 914 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Buchanan, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Buchanan, Villa Rica, Bremen, Temple, Tallapoosa, Mount Zion, Waco, Abilene, Draketown, Treasure Lake and Bowdon Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
